Definition: EHDS refined base model for Immunisation

Short: Common header for all patient-related data
Definition: Common header for all patient-related data

Short: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.
Definition: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

Short: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).
Definition: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).

Short: Status of the resource or document
Definition: Indicates the current status of the immunisation event (completed, not-done).

Short: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Definition: Reason for the current status of the resource.

Short: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
Definition: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
Disease or agent that the vaccination provides protection against.
Generic description of the vaccine/prophylaxis or its component(s).

Short: Number in a series of vaccinations / doses

Definition: The date and optionally the exact time when the vaccination was administered.
Name/code of administering centre or a health authority responsible for the vaccination event
Health professional responsible for administering the vaccine or prophylaxis
The date when the vaccination is planned to be given/repeated (e.g. next dose)
